name: juvenility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being juvenile (= behaving in a way that is silly and typical of a child): My occasional lapses into juvenility seemed to pain him. Juvenility is rampant in contemporary culture.
More examplesFewer examplesI have never once complained about the juvenility of some comments on here.Generally speaking, nothing makes drearier reading than deliberate juvenility on the part of adults.In some respects the work shows its juvenility, gathering together the influences that eventually formed the mature artist.
